newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Cimpor lifted by buy recommendation.
newsitem.headline: Cimpor lifted by buy recommendation.

text.p: Shares of Portuguese cement group Cimpor-Cimentos de Portugal rose strongly, buoyed by a buy recommendation from Morgan Stanley and good prospects for cement sales, dealers said.
"Cimpor has been rising steadily and the market is incorporating the forecasts of Morgan Stanley, as well as expectations of an increase in the production and sale of cement," an operator said.
Morgan Stanley has said Cimpor shares could reach 4,500 escudos within 12 months and 5,000 escudos within 18 months.
Cimpor stood at 3,869 escudos, up 31, in volume of 313,163 shares at 0957 GMT.
